Package library.geometry

Class Polygon

java.lang.Object
library.geometry.Shape
library.geometry.Polygon
public class Polygon
extends Shapes
Class for representing polygon shape.

  • Constructor Details

    • Polygon

      public Polygon​(Vectors2D[] vertList)
      Constructor takes a supplied list of vertices and generates a convex hull around them.
      Parameters:
      vertList - Vertices of polygon to create.

    • Polygon

      public Polygon​(double width, double height)
      Constructor to generate a rectangle.
      Parameters:
      width - Desired width of rectangle
      height - Desired height of rectangle

    • Polygon

      public Polygon​(int radius, int noOfSides)
      Generate a regular polygon with a specified number of sides and size.
      Parameters:
      radius - The maximum distance any vertex is away from the center of mass.
      noOfSides - The desired number of face the polygon has.

  • Method Details

    • calcNormals

      public void calcNormals()
      Generates normals for each face of the polygon. Positive normals of polygon faces face outward.

    • calcMass

      public void calcMass​(double density)
      Implementation of calculating the mass of a polygon.
      Specified by:
      calcMass in class Shapes
      Parameters:
      density - The desired density to factor into the calculation.

    • createAABB

      public void createAABB()
      Generates an AABB encompassing the polygon and binds it to the body.
      Specified by:
      createAABB in class Shapes

    • draw

      public void draw​(java.awt.Graphics2D g, testbed.ColourSettings paintSettings, testbed.Camera camera)
      Debug draw method for a polygon.
      Specified by:
      draw in class Shapes
      Parameters:
      g - Graphics2D object to draw to
      paintSettings - Colour settings to draw the objects to screen with
      camera - Camera class used to convert points from world space to view space
